three additional baselines.from sentence: We run the task with three additional baselines : NUTM using direct attention ( DA ) , NUTM using key - value without regularization ( KV ) , NUTM using fixed , uniform program distribution ( UP ) and a vanilla NTM with 2 memory heads ( h = 2 ) .

DA.from sentence:
The results demonstrate that DA exhibits fast yet shallow convergence .
It tends to fall into local minima , which finally fails to reach zero loss .

Key- value attention.from sentence:
Key- value attention helps NUTM converge completely with fewer iterations .
The performance is further improved with the proposed regularization loss .

underperforms.from sentence: UP underperforms NUTM as it lacks dynamic programs .

NTM.from sentence: The NTM with 2 heads shows slightly better convergence compared to the NTM , yet obviously underperforms NUTM ( p = 2 ) with 1 head and fewer parameters .
